item.title: The Tiny Boat
item.dc:creator: Mariana Cevallos
item.content:encoded: Our most lightweight and packable boat. It weighs only 4.1 lbs and packs down to the size of a roll of paper towels, making it easy to store and transport. Keep it in a closet in your apartment, in your van, car or throw it in your day pack, and make the most of your time outside.

item.title: 5 Panel Hat
item.dc:creator: Mike Davlantes
item.description: Our classic 5 panel hat is your go-to hat for any urban or outdoor adventure.
item.content:encoded: Our classic 5 panel hat is your go-to hat for any urban or outdoor adventure. Made from a breathable material, this lightweight and packable lid features an EVA brim that allows the hat to float on water, a subtle woven patch, and an adjustable nylon strap with clip closure for easy adjustability.

item.title: Gunny Gorge – Whitewater
item.dc:creator: Mike Davlantes
item.description: Designed to run challenging whitewater while keeping you dry.
item.content:encoded:
The Gunny Gorge is designed to run challenging whitewater (up to class III) while keeping you dry. It features a rocker shape that allows you to surf bigger waves without swamping, and a spraydeck that will keep you dry and provide extra reinforcement in the wear-areas for heavy gear.

This packraft is equipped with a waterproof/airtight TiZip zipper to store gear inside the boat itself!

item.title: Dirty Devil – All Around
item.dc:creator: Mike Davlantes
item.content:encoded:
The Dirty Devil is our most versatile packraft: a perfect combination of lightweight and compact, without sacrificing durability. It features a removable spraydeck, allowing you to conveniently unzip it when it’s hot outside or keep it on when you need to stay totally dry. Additionally, it includes a removable fin that enhances maneuverability on up to class II waters.

The TiZip version of this packraft is sold out. The product in stock is the same but without a TiZip.
